Figure 2 Cyclic voltammograms of 0.1 MnBu4NOAc solution in MeCN/H2O (9.0 mL/1.0 mL) at room temperature. The working electrode is a diameter glassy carbon working electrode (GCE) (d=3 mm). The reference electrode is SCE (saturated aqueous KCl). The counter electrode is a platinum wire. The scan rate is 50 mV/s.
